instructions: Navigate to the screen you want to record with a screenshot. Press the Power and Volume Down buttons at the same time. It might take practice to master the simultaneous pressing. Hold both buttons until you hear an audible click when the screenshot is taken. If you don't hold the buttons down until you hear the click, your phone may turn off the screen or lower the volume. Look for the screenshot in your Photo Gallery or in a Screenshots folder.

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PHONE' and tap About . Tap Software information . View the Software number . Review the information in the Review software version details section below.

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PHONE' and tap About . Tap Software information . View the Software number . Review the information in the Review software version details section below.

From the Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Tap About . Tap Software update . Tap Check Now and follow the on-screen prompts. This is a large update and may take 20 minutes or more to download and install.
